name: tm01
effect: Teaches Focus Punch to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Hone Claws to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Focus Punch Gen II: DynamicPunch Gen I: Mega Punch)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Powerful, but makes
the user flinch if
hit by the foe.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Powerful, but makes
the user flinch if
hit by the foe.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
An attack that is
executed last.
The user flinches
if hit beforehand.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user focuses its mind before
launching this attack. It will fail if
the user is hit before it is used.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user focuses its mind before
launching this attack. It will fail if
the user is hit before it is used.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user focuses its mind before
launching this attack. It will fail if
the user is hit before it is used.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user sharpens its claws to
boost its Attack stat and accuracy.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user sharpens its claws to
boost its Attack stat and accuracy.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user sharpens its claws to
boost its Attack stat and accuracy.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk
stats increase.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk
stats increase.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging
straight into the target. This may also make the
target flinch.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The target is attacked by a kick launched with
muscle-packed power.
